value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Sharena, reporting back! I've scouted
the tomb. The enemy was easy to
locate.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Not surprising. How many troops
are there?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Thousands... Too many to count.$k$pAnd they're on the march—south.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|What's south of here?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|There's a town less than a day's
march.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|This is not good. There's no way
they'd be able to defend themselves.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We have to help!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Think, Sharena! We can't stop an
army of thousands by ourselves.$k$pWe must dispatch a message to His
Majesty at once and hope that his
knights can get here in time.$k$pThat said...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|That said, they won't make it.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Those poor townspeople...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No...we can't let them die like that.$k$pWe have to buy some time.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Commander...$k$pWe can bait the enemy.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That would get their attention.
They'd stop and focus on us.$k$pAt that point, though, we'd have to
outrun them...or hold out until the
king's knights arrive.$k$pTalk about dangerous...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It's exceedingly dangerous, but we
don't have any other options.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You're right.$k$p$EFace_Anger|Come on, everybody! We're going to
have to rely on the element of
surprise. We'll sneak up on them!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Stay hidden, and move in small
groups. Spread out, and encircle
the enemy from behind...$k$pEach group must do what it can to
avoid the enemy while making it look
like they're part of a larger force.$k$pOnce we've got their attention, they'll
halt. This should buy us some time,
but not a lot.$k$pAnd when they see through it—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|See through it? They're here!
Everyone—disengage! Retreat!$k$pOhh... Can we make it?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|It's too late to run, Sharena. We'll
have to make a stand here—until the
knights arrive!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|The king's knights have arrived!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, hooray! The enemy is retreating!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|And if the enemy heads toward town,
they'll be turning their backs to
Father's forces.$k$pThe townspeople should be safe.
What a relief...$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Father.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I've heard about what happened
here. Why would you take such a
foolish risk?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The people...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Father, we—we had to protect—$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I was speaking to your brother,
Sharena.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Yes, sir.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The enemy was on the march. The
town had no defenses...$k$pWe had to do what we could to stop
them, so I came up with a plan.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You thought you could face an army?
Hardly.$k$pIf you had miscalculated even slightly,
you'd be dead now. Dead, Alfonse.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Yes, Father. That is so.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I commend the Order of Heroes for
its victory over Múspell.$k$pThere is something you need to
understand, however. You are not a
Hero, Alfonse.$k$pYou need not be amidst them, waving
your sword about. Your place is
elsewhere.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Father, I... I just—$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You are moved to save people. Is that
it? But a king's duty is not to rescue
those he sees in front of him...$k$pA king's domain holds thousands.
Protecting each and every one of
them—that is the duty of a king.$k$pI am not sure you are capable of
that—not yet, at any rate.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I...I can't...$k$pNo, I am not ready, so I... While you
reign—I thought I could help the
people.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|And if I die?$k$pYou would be king. Are you ready to
rule Askr?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I...$k$pNo, I am not. Not yet. I am no match
for you, Father.$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|And if you died in battle, what then?$k$pThe time I have left is shorter than
you realize. I will die one day, and
it will be sooner than you think.$k$pWhat will that day mean for Askr and
its people?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I... They...$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Your life is not that of a swordsman
rushing to the rescue. Your role is to
lead this land and its people.$k$pIf you can only comprehend the
suffering that is right in front of your
face...$k$pThen your compassion has its limits.
You are far from ready to be king.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Father... I am truly sorry.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Alfonse...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Mother? What's wrong?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Can't a mother help bandage her little
boy's wounds?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I'm all right, Mother. I am no longer a
child.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|Is that so? Well...hearing that makes
me a bit sad, too.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Father was not wrong.$k$pI need to learn to think on a grand
scale, as he does...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|He'd be happy to hear you say that.$k$pThis brings back memories. You're
just like he was at your age.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I am? Really?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|He was always rushing out into the
countryside to help the citizens or
off exploring other realms...$k$pHe was so reckless when I first met
him.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Truly? It's so difficult to believe...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|He is a passionate man, and if we
didn't keep an eye on him, well...$k$p$EFace_Pain|There's a reason he changed,
though—that he became so cautious.$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Mother?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Never mind all that, dear. Rest well,
Alfonse. You've earned it. We will
speak again tomorrow.$k$p$Sbs150|
